credits.actor: Ben Affleck, Missi Pyle, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris, Tyler Perry, Kim Dickens, Emily Ratajkowski, Casey Wilson

programme.title: Lufta
programme.desc: Jet Li, Jason Statham. Pas vrasjes se partnerit te tij Tomit dhe familjes se tij, agjenti Krouford pushtohet nga nje ndjenje e pashoqe hakmarrjeje aq sa tere bota e tij shplekset ne nje vorbull faji dhe tradhtie.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Zërat përtej murit
programme.desc: Emilia Clarke. Një infermiere e re shkon në një kështjellë të izoluar për të ndihmuar një fëmijë që s'ka folur që nga vdekja e nënës së tij. Por sa më shumë qëndron, aq më shumë ajo kupton se në muret e kështjellës fshihet një qenie mbinatyrore.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Unë nuk jam e çmendur
programme.desc: Jennifer Hudson, Sarah Hyland. Përmes 5 historive të ndryshme, pasqyrohen marrëdhëniet, sfidat, shpresat dhe triumfet e njerëzve që vuajnë nga probleme mendore...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Burra të vegjël
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear. Xhejk dhe Toni bëhen miq të ngyshtë kur i ati i Xhejkut trashëgon një apartament dhe dyqanin ku punon mamaja e Tonit. Por konflikti i të rriturve për qiranë e dyqanit do të ndëryhjë në kufijtë e miqësisë së tyre.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: 6 Vjet
programme.desc: Ndërsa i afrohen diplomimit, një çift i ri, i bashkuar prej 6 vitesh nga një dashuri idealiste, fillon të përçahet kur mundësi të reja karriere shfaqen papriur.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: E dashur Eleanor
programme.desc: Liana Liberato, Isabelle Fuhrman. Në vitin 1962, në kulmin e krizës së raketave në Kubë, dy adoleshente ndërmarrin një udhëtim përmes gjithë Amerikës në kërkim të Eleonor Ruzveltit...
programme.category: Dramë
aventurë

programme.title: El cantante
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2007. Marc Anthony, Jennifer Lopez. Biografia e Hector Lavoe, një prej këngëtarëve më të njohur të muzikës salsa në vitet 70. Që nga fama e tij e deri tek problemet me drogën, që solli edhe fundin e hidhur.
programme.category: Biografi
muzikë

programme.title: Pasojat e inatit
programme.desc: Joan Allen, Kevin Costner. Një grua, nënë e 4 vajzave e braktisur nga burri, që gjen 'paqe' tek shishja e alkoolit miqësohet me fqinjin e saj ish sportist i njohur, i cili i zgjidh problemet me të njëjtën mënyrë...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Nëna e bij
programme.desc: Naomi Watts, Annette Bening, Kerry Washington. Film kandidat për 9 çmime kinematografike. Një eksplorim i temës delikate të adoptimit dhe ndikimit të thellë që ai ka në jetët e tri grave.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: W.E. Romanca e shekullit
programme.desc: Me regji dhe skenar nga Madonna. Një grua e vetmuar, fiksohet pas historisë së romancës së shekullit midis mbretit Edward VIII dhe një gruaje amerikane të martuar. Kjo histori i jep forcën që edhe ajo të kërkojë lumturinë...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Rregullat s'vlejnë për ty
programme.desc: Lily Collins, Alden Ehrenreich. Në Hollivudin e vitit 1958, një aspirante për aktore dhe një shofer, të dashuruar pas njëri-tjetrit, përballen me besimin e tyre dhe shefin eksentrik Hauard Hjus, i cili e ndalon rreptësisht dashurinë mes punonjësve...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: E dashura e Larsit
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2007. Ryan Gosling. Lars, një i ri nga një qytet i vogël, i turpshëm dhe i pafat në dashuri, më në fund sjell në shtëpi vajzën perfekte. Problemi qëndron se ajo është një kukull seksi, që ai e ka blerë në internet.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Jeta sekrete e bletëve
programme.desc: Dakota Fanning, Queen Latifah, Jennifer Hudson, Alicia Keys. Në një kohë kur paragjykimet raciale ishin ende të mëdha, një vajzë e bardhë pranohet në shtëpinë e tri motrave me ngjyrë, të cilat jetojnë duke u kujdesur për bletët e tyre.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Romancë në Kajro
programme.desc: Patricia Clarkson, Alexander Siddig. Ndërkohë që ndodhet me pushime në Kajro, një grua e suksesshme, fillon një romancë të bukur dhe të papritur me një mikun e burrit të saj.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Përtej fjalëve
programme.desc: Një karikaturist i lënduar nga ndarja, bie në dashuri me një vajzë shpirtlirë që po bëhet gati të largohet. Ndërsa ndjenjat për njëri-tjetrin shtohen dhe koha për të qëndruar bashkë zvogëlohet, ata duhet të përballen me faktin që ndoshta, dashuria s'është.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Guximtarët
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2011. Nga krijuesit e 'Zjarri i dashurisë', vjen një tjetër dramë kristiane. Kjo është historia e 4 policëve, bashkëshortë dhe baballarë të cilët pas një tragjedie, vihen përballë frikës, shpresës dhe besimit në Zot.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Eskorta
programme.desc: Lyndsy Fonseca. I dëshpëruar për një histori të mirë, Mitç, një gazetar me varësi nga seksi, eksploron botën e eskortave të luksit kur bind një prostitutë që ka studiuar në univeristetin e Standford-it, ta mbajë si shoqërues.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi romantike

programme.title: Krimi i Lilandit
programme.desc: Ryan Gosling, Don Cheadle, Kevin Spacey. Një mësues në një qendër riedukimi, përpiqet të mësojë se ç'e shtyu një adoleshent për të vrarë moshatarin e tij. Një krim që nxjerr në pah këndvështrimin e adoleshentit për botën që e rrethon.
programme.category: Dramë psikologjike

programme.title: Rripi i kuq
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Tim Allen. Një instruktor i arteve marciale, i cili gjithë jetën ia kishte kushtuar sportit dhe integritetit, tundohet nga një ofertë që mund t'i sjellë famë e para. Por çmimi që duhet të paguajë mund të rrënojë gjithçka.
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: Kurajë për të jetuar
programme.desc: AnnaSophia Robb, Dennis Quaid, Helen Hunt. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë! Pas sulmit të një peshkaqeni, një vajzë e re humbet krahun. Me ndihmën e familjes dhe besimin në Zot, ajo arrin të gjejë kurajën për të vazhduar ëndrrën...
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Një ditë
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway, Jim Sturgess. Pasi kalojnë natën e diplomimit bashkë, Deksteri dhe Ema tregohen në po të njëjtën ditë në 20 vitet e ardhshme për të parë se ku ndodhen me jetën e tyre...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Jetohet veç një herë
programme.desc: Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol. Pas fejesës së njërit prej tyre, tre miq që në fëmijëri, ndërmarrin një udhëtim të paharrueshëm. Një udhëtim që do t'u tregojë se jetohet veç një herë.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Shtegu i zjarrit
programme.desc: Hrithik Roshan, Priyanka Chopra. Një riprodhim mjaft i arrirë i filmit kult të vitit 1990. Një djalosh, bëhet dëshmitar i vrasjes së babait të tij. Vite më vonë, ai rikthehet në qytetin e lindjes i vendosur për t'u hakmarrë.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Shtëpia në Palos Verdes
programme.desc: Jennifer Garner. Jeta e re në një periferi idilike bregdetare të Kalifornisë, shkatërron një familje. Adoleshentja Medina detyrohet të bëhet forca që mban bashkë pjesën e mbetur të familjes, ndërkohë që zbulon një pasion të ri për sërfin.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Realiteti i një fëmije
programme.desc: Jenny Slate, Jake Lacy. Pas një nate pasionante, që rezulton në një shtatzani të padëshiruar, një komediane 20 e ca vjeçare aspak serioze, duhet të përballet me realitetin e të pasurit një fëmijë.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Copëza parajse
programme.desc: Kate Hudson, Gael García Bernal. Pas një vizite tek doktori, jeta e një vajze plot gjallëri do të ndryshojë rrënjësisht. Bashkë me doktorin, ajo fillon një rrugëtim ku do të përjetojë ndjenja që s'i kishte parashikuar kurrë.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Shpirtra binjakë
programme.desc: Adrianne Palicki, Brian Klugman. Dy njerëz që nuk përshtatet aspak me njëri tjetrin, përpiqen të lënë mënjanë gabimbet e të kaluarës, për t'i dhënë një mundësi dashurisë mes tyre...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Mendje të Pushtuara
programme.desc: Tasya një vrasëse elitare në një organizatë sekrete, duke përdorur teknologjinë më të fundit, merr kontrollin e trupave të njerëzve të tjerë për të ekzekutuar objektivat. Por një ditë ajo bllokohet brenda një mendjeje që kërcënon ta asgjësojë.

programme.title: Zoti Tolkin
programme.desc: Nicholas Hoult, Lily Collins. Vitet e formimit të J. R. R. Tolkien, autorit të trilogjisë 'Kryezoti i Unazave'. Një rikthim në periudhën më të bukur të jetës së tij, të cilën ai e jetoi me imagjinatë dhe që u ndërpre papritmas nga lufta.

thriller

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: Hilary Swank. Jeta përsosur e një agjenti sportiv të martuar, shkatërrohet kur zbulon se gruaja seksi dhe misterioze me të cilën kaloi një natë pasionante, është një detektive këmbëngulëse që e ngatërron atë në hetimin e saj të fundit.

programme.desc: Chris Pine. Historia e vërtetë e patreguar e Robert Bruce, një fisnik i rënë i Skocisë mesjetare i cili u bë mbret kundër vullnetit të tij dhe më pas një hero i jashtëligjshëm.

programme.desc: Sebastian Stan, Samuel L. Jackson, Ed Harris. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Refuzimi i kërkesës për të nderuar me Medaljen e Nderit një hero të Luftës së Vietnamit, hetohet pas dekadash nga një punonjës i Pentagonit, që zbulon të vërtetën shokuese.

programme.title: Filmi i frikshëm
programme.desc: Parodi e filmave: Britma, Hallouin, Shqisa e gjashtë, Unë e di ç'ke bërë verën e kaluar, The Matrix, Buffy, vrasësja e vampirëve.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Henku dhe Asha
programme.desc: Një studente indiane në Prage dhe një njujorkez i vetmuar komunikojne duke i dërguar njëri-tjetrit videomesazhe. Korrespondenca e pazakontë thellon lidhjen e tyre dhe ata duhet të vendosin nëse ka ardhur momenti të takohen.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Telashet e natës së fundit
programme.desc: Dy gjimnazistë të huaj sapo kanë përfunduar studimet merren peng gjatë përpjekjes së tyre për të humbur virgjerinë natën e fundit në Amerikë, dhe kjo do të jetë nata më e bukur e jetës së tyre.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Të fejohemi përkohësisht
programme.desc: Shane McRae, Aubrey Dollar. Miq gjithë jetën, një djalë dhe një vajzë pretendojnë që janë fejuar për t'i plotësuar dëshirën e fundit babait të tij. Por gjithçka del jashtë kontrollit, kur mes tyre fillojnë të lindin ndjenja të vërteta.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Shpirti binjak
programme.desc: Piper Perabo, Lena Headey. Më në fund mbërrin dita e dasmës se Heck-ut dhe Rachel-it, por në çastin kur do të thonë 'Po-në e përjetshme, vajza do të pikase mes të ftuareve një person që do të trondisë ndjenjat e saj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mirë se erdhët President!
programme.desc: C.Bisio, K.Smutniak. Pepino, një i papunë që jeton ne fshat, gabimisht e gjen veten President të Italisë. Ai nuk do të përfshihet në kurthet politike dhe me ndershmërinë që e karakterizon, do të vërë në vijë gjithçka që nuk funksionon...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Puthje franceze
programme.desc: 1995. Regjia: Lawrence Kasdan; Aktorët:Meg Ryan, Kevin Kline. Kejti ndodhet në Paris per të rifituar zemrën e burrit të ëndrrave të saj. Tani për tani po jeton endrrën e saj më të keqe.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Superbabai
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn, Chris Pratt. Një njeri që s'ka arritur shumë në jetë, merr lajmin se nga gjithë dhurimet e tij në klinikën e fertilitetit, ai është baba i 533 fëmijëve dhe vihet në dilemë nëse duhet të identifikohet apo jo.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ti e njeh Klaudian?
programme.desc: Giovani, nje njeri metodik, i martuar me huqet dhe zakonet e perhershme. Giacomo, i divorcuar dhe teper i kenaqur nga jeta. Aldo, nje shofer taksie qe dashurohet lehtesisht. Po Klaudia kush eshte?
programme.category: Aldo
Giovanni e Giacomo

programme.title: Tre të jashtëligjshmit
programme.desc: Tre të panjohur që bëhen shpejt miq për kokë, udhëtojnë me një makinë të vjedhur në ndjekje të dashurisë së humbur, por do të bëhen shumë shpejt të ndjekurit më të famshëm të vendit...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy, Thandie Newton. Norbit, gjithmonë ka pasur një jetë të vështirë, por në prag të martesës me Rasputian e tmerrshme, gjërat po përkeqësohen. Kthimi në qytet i Kejtit, mund t'i japë një kthesë të këndshme jetës së tij.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Me fjalë të tjera
programme.desc: Një gjeni teknologjie i ngathët me vajzat, krijon një aplikiacion që i gjen kujtdo shpirtin binjak. Por kur kandidatja e tij qëllon të jetë një latine që s'flet anglisht, ai niset drejt vendit të saj për të vërtetuar që aplikacioni s'ka defekte...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Galeria e zemrave të thyera
programme.desc: 2020. Pasi braktiset nga i dashuri, një e re nga Nju Jorku krijon një galeri me sendet e ruajtura nga lidhjet e mëparshme dhe zbulon se ajo nuk është e vetmja që ka nevojë për pak ndihmë për t'i hedhur gjërat pas krahëve.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Djallin afër
programme.desc: Helen Hunt, Jon Tenney. Disa ngjarje të çuditshme shqetësojnë detektivin e një qyteti të vogël dhe familjen e tij, ndërsa ai heton zhdukjen e mistershme të një djali 10-vjeçar.
programme.category: Horror
krim

programme.title: Parfumi: Historia e një vrasësi
programme.desc: Ben Whishaw, Dustin Hoffman. Një i ri i lindur me dhuntinë për të nuhatur gjithçka, krijon parfumet më të mira në botë. Por puna e tij merr një kthesë vdekjeprurëse, kur në kërkim të parfumit perfekt ai fillon të ekzekutojë vajza të reja.
programme.category: Krim
mister

programme.title: Dëborë e njollosur
programme.desc: Ricardo Darín. Një tragjedi e vjetër dhe një armiqësi e fjetur do të rizgjohen kur një burrë rikthehet në shtëpinë e vjetër, për të bindur vëllanë që të shesin pronën e izoluar familjare.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: Tornado
programme.desc: Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton. Kandidat për 2 Oskar. Një çift në prag të divorcit, vazhdojnë të takohen me njëri tjetrin sepse të dy janë studiues tornadosh dhe një i tillë me përmasa katastrofike po i afrohet qytetit të tyre.
programme.category: Aventurë
thriller

programme.title: Përmbytja fatale
programme.desc: 1998. Robert Duvall, Tea Leoni, Morgan Freeman. Kur një grup astronomësh zbulojnë se nje komete gjigande do te godase tokën, e gjithë raca njerëzore nis të numëroje ditët. Të gjithë do të rendin dhe lufta për mbijetesë është e hapur.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Kohë të trazuara
programme.desc: Jon Voight, Teri Polo. Një detektiv bashkëpunon me një person telepatik per të gjetur një fëmijë të humbur.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: I Infiltruari
programme.desc: Chris Cooper, Ryan Phillippe. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë. Një agjent i ri i FBI-së, ngarkohet me një mision të vështirë; të zbulojë nëse një agjent i dekoruar i agjencisë është një tradhtar...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Gjahtaret
programme.desc: 2007. Richard Gere, Terrence Howard. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë. Një gazetar i ri, një kameraman dhe një korrespondent lufte i diskredituar, nisin një mision të rrezikshëm për të intervistuar kriminelin më të madh të luftës së Bosnjes...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: I harruari
programme.desc: Kur vëllai i tij i rrëmbyer kthehet një njeri plotësisht i ndryshuar dhe pa asnjë kujtesë për 19 ditët që ka qënë zhdukur, Jin-seok vendos të gjejë të vërtetën pas rrëmbimit të tij.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: E paimagjinueshme
programme.desc: 2017. Nicolas Cage, Gina Gershon, Nicky Whelan. Një çift strehon një nënë të re, e cila po përpiqet t'i shpëtojë të kaluarës së saj, pa e ditur se ajo fsheh një sekret të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Dëbora e Luftës së Ftohtë
programme.desc: Gjatë Luftës së Ftohtë, një ruse që spiunon për llogari të amerikanëve, ngarkohet të vjedhë informacione nga një politikan i ri, i parapëlqyeri i Kremlinit, por detyra ndërlikohet kur ajo bie në dashuri me të.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Mos më lër
programme.desc: I shkatërruar nga vdekja e vajzës në një aksident të tmerrshëm, një baba fillon të besojë se e bija po përpiqet ta kontaktojë përtej varrit nëpërmjet një ëndrre përsëritëse, dhe se pas ëndrrës fshihet çelësi për ta kthyer atë në jetë.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Verë, 1984
programme.desc: 2018. Pasi dyshojnë së fqinji i tyre polic është vrasës serial, një grup adoleshentësh, kalojnë verën duke e vëzhguar dhe mbledhur fakte. Ndërsa i afrohen zbulimit të së vërtetës, situata do të bëhet e rrezikshme.
programme.category: Horror
mister

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
Ta luda ljubav
programme.desc: Crazy, Stupid, Love.: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Julianne Moore, Emma Stone. A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1570728/","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MjkwMTM0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzc4NDg2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1570728/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"IronBallsM"},"dateCreated":"2011-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed everything about this movie.","reviewBody":"My initial reaction is that this film is the best romantic comedy that I've seen in years. The genre has been pretty devoid of quality lately. So, I don't know if that plays a part or not and I really don't care at this point. I enjoyed everything about this movie. It has tremendous heart and charisma and it's so very easy to get caught up in to the lives of these characters. A certain degree of patience is required while viewing because some secondary characters that feel unnecessary to the story are worth getting to know. Steve Carell's character is the one everyone empathizes with and when the movie shifts away from the "A" story you wonder why and start to think that the "B" story is going to be muddled or cliché or one to endure. Well, they're not and everything comes together in a wonderful fashion. The entire cast here is perfection. The overall message may be one to debate but it doesn't matter because the ride and this film are just so smart and so well done."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":493113,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-07-29","keywords":"divorce,marriage,unfaithfulness,adultery,marital problem","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722091801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Newly single Cal Weaver (Steve Carell) is taken on as wingman and protÃ©gÃ© to handsome, thirtysomething player Jacob Palmer (Ryan Gosling). programme.title: Vratar galaktiki
Vratar galaktike
programme.desc:
Vratar galaktiki: Directed by Dzhanik Fayziev. With Viktoriya Agalakova, Georgiy Bestaev, Khristina Blokhina, Valeriya Bukhina. An enormous spaceship hovers over Earth-this is a stadium, which hosts sports events that resemble soccer but at mind-boggling speeds. The name of the game is cosmoball." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7176054/","name":"Vratar galaktiki","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWU0ZTk0MDctMmM5MS00MmQ4LThiYTYtYmNhMDIxN2E2NWQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTcyNzUxNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An enormous spaceship hovers over Earth-this is a stadium, which hosts sports events that resemble soccer but at mind-boggling speeds. The name of the game is cosmoball.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7176054/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"notom-23012"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Poor at Best","reviewBody":"The CGI - given the films budget is exceptional - everything else... not so much.

The Plot - what there is of one, is all over the place and the Acting - especially Viktoriya Agalakova (obviously the daughter of some oligarch who helped finance the movie (because no one in their right mind would hire this girl) ) and Georgiy Bestaev is just dismal.

The single non 2-Dimensional actor was Mariya Lisovaya (Anya / Valaya) who managed to outshine the leading pair by an enormous factor.

To the 5 writers 'credited' for this movie: Please consider your life choices. If this is even close to the best you can produce - then you're doomed to utter failure. The dialogue is just soooo simplistic and often demeaning to both the audience and the actors.

Direction: Above average - considering the film is 'mainly' CGI - and getting both the actors and crew to stay on point must have been a pita - they did an excellent job.

Further on the plus side - there's a few moments of 'action/suspense', one moment of actual 'comedy' and over an hour and half of decent CGI... but that's it.

As an adult, I ploughed through this movie and nearly sobbed with relief when it ended - hopefully, my sacrifice will be taken into consideration if you think about watching this rubbish... but, if you have kids (9-11) then they're going to really enjoy it !!

Note: I changed both my rating as an adult from a: 3 to (as a grandparent) a: 6 simply based upon my grandkids reaction to the film. Apparently, I may not now be qualified to judge a movie aimed at the child demographic now that I'm in my 70's - who knew?!!

Have a nice day.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1897,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Sport"],"datePublished":"2020-08-27","keywords":"ballgame","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3923099929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBhMDc3YTItNTZmOS00MWNjLWIzNTgtMDExOWM2YmZiMjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBhMDc3YTItNTZmOS00MWNjLWIzNTgtMDExOWM2YmZiMjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5030374/","name":"Viktoriya Agalakova"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11200820/","name":"Georgiy Bestaev"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11195464/","name":"Khristina Blokhina"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265747/","name":"Dzhanik Fayziev"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137977/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0366962/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0654880/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265747/","name":"Dzhanik Fayziev"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7416378/","name":"Twister Murchison"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9156736/","name":"Drew Row"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7176054, Title: Vratar galaktiki, --- Description: Vratar galaktiki: Directed by Dzhanik Fayziev. With Viktoriya Agalakova, Georgiy Bestaev, Khristina Blokhina, Valeriya Bukhina. An enormous spaceship hovers over Earth-this is a stadium, which hosts sports events that resemble soccer but at mind-boggling speeds. The name of the game is cosmoball." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7176054/","name":"Vratar galaktiki","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWU0ZTk0MDctMmM5MS00MmQ4LThiYTYtYmNhMDIxN2E2NWQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTcyNzUxNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An enormous spaceship hovers over Earth-this is a stadium, which hosts sports events that resemble soccer but at mind-boggling speeds. The name of the game is cosmoball.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7176054/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"notom-23012","dateCreated":"2021-02-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Poor at Best","reviewBody":"The CGI - given the films budget is exceptional - everything else... not so much.

The Plot - what there is of one, is all over the place and the Acting - especially Viktoriya Agalakova (obviously the daughter of some oligarch who helped finance the movie (because no one in their right mind would hire this girl) ) and Georgiy Bestaev is just dismal.

The single non 2-Dimensional actor was Mariya Lisovaya (Anya / Valaya) who managed to outshine the leading pair by an enormous factor.

To the 5 writers 'credited' for this movie: Please consider your life choices. If this is even close to the best you can produce - then you're doomed to utter failure. The dialogue is just soooo simplistic and often demeaning to both the audience and the actors.

Direction: Above average - considering the film is 'mainly' CGI - and getting both the actors and crew to stay on point must have been a pita - they did an excellent job.

Further on the plus side - there's a few moments of 'action/suspense', one moment of actual 'comedy' and over an hour and half of decent CGI... but that's it.

As an adult, I ploughed through this movie and nearly sobbed with relief when it ended - hopefully, my sacrifice will be taken into consideration if you think about watching this rubbish... but, if you have kids (9-11) then they're going to really enjoy it !!

Note: I changed both my rating as an adult from a: 3 to (as a grandparent) a: 6 simply based upon my grandkids reaction to the film. Apparently, I may not now be qualified to judge a movie aimed at the child demographic now that I'm in my 70's - who knew?!!

Have a nice day.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1897,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6,"genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Sport"],"datePublished":"2020-08-27","keywords":"ballgame","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3923099929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBhMDc3YTItNTZmOS00MWNjLWIzNTgtMDExOWM2YmZiMjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDBhMDc3YTItNTZmOS00MWNjLWIzNTgtMDExOWM2YmZiMjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5030374/","name":"Viktoriya Agalakova","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11200820/","name":"Georgiy Bestaev","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11195464/","name":"Khristina Blokhina"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265747/","name":"Dzhanik Fayziev"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137977/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0366962/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0654880/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265747/","name":"Dzhanik Fayziev","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7416378/","name":"Twister Murchison","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9156736/","name":"Drew Row"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Australia
Australija
programme.desc:
Australia: Directed by Baz Luhrmann. With Shea Adams, Eddie Baroo, Ray Barrett, Tony Barry. Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455824/","name":"Australia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJhMTAyZWMtMjRlZC00NWU3LTg3ODQtYTkyZjRiN2NhY2Y5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jpschapira"},"dateCreated":"2009-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dreams be dreams","reviewBody":"It seems just about right that Baz Luhrman waited seven years after "Moulin Rouge!" to bring us "Australia". Not because it is a better movie, but because it's very different and a lot more ambitious. Of course that this has a downside, and it's fair to say it as soon as possible: "Australia" is flawed and longer than it should be, and maybe (just maybe) one day it will be viewed as the dream come true of a man very much in love with cinema, and-let's not forget-with love.

We shouldn't forget that we're talking about Baz Luhrman, we should know what to expect sometimes. Therefore, if the beginning of this film disappoints you a bit, it's completely understandable. We meet a little boy named Nullah (the very promising Brandon Walters), who talks about races and unnamed countries, about a lady everyone calls Mrs. Boss and the road that got her to Australia and more specifically to a place called Faraway Downs in the company of a man they call the Drover.

Yes, it's all quite confusing, even more when Luhrman throws in a historical context that, I suspect, he doesn't really care much about. But everything is fine because we get to meet the stars of the show. Mrs. Boss is actually called Sarah and is played by Nicole Kidman with the same air and tone of voice she's been giving us the whole decade. Her job ends up being less risky than Hugh Jackman's, who plays this Drover as a successful combination of what he's been giving us since he came into the scene: the action hero, the tough guy, the romantic and sensitive lover and the sexy man who makes women scream.

Maybe I'm not being critical enough, but there's a scene in which the Drover appears dressed up in a suit, clean-shaven I promise you that every women in the theater exhaled. Does this mean something to you? To me, it means that Luhrman's dream is a reality. Three hours of film and not getting tired one minute? Not feeling disgust when listening to cheesy phrases and watching excessively dramatic moments? "Australia" is pure melodrama, and I compliment its director for making it look that way without any shame. The keys can be seen all along the ride: the repetition of clichéd phrases, the intense close-ups, the slow-motion parts of the characters, the epic proportions of David Hirschfelder's score, the establishment of a song that accompanies the characters through their endless journey and the use of narration in places it didn't need to be; the same with some images.

However, the movie is one wonderful image after another (cinematographer Mandy Walker, from Australia-the country-; best of luck with the Oscar nomination you deserve), and it wins the audience like few movies out there these days can, providing delightful entertainment; you may discuss if it does this fairly, or if it cheats and it manipulates. You may also discuss the ambiguous ending.

One more thing. As with any dream, there's a moment in which we wake up; and that moment for Luhrman has to do with believing his picture could get to the race of Best Picture contenders, like his fantastic "Moulin Rouge!". But as I said, this movie is very different from the latter one, and Luhrman is no James Cameron That one really had it the whole way.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":121967,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-12-24","keywords":"prejudice,year 1942,year 1939,male objectification,australian aborigine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Australia: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1784152089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NzMwOTUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTQ4MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5NzMwOTUwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTQ4MTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000173/","name":"Nicole Kidman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413168/","name":"Hugh Jackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011354/","name":"Shea Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525303/","name":"Baz Luhrmann"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0062619/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068628/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064181/","name":"Stuart Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525303/","name":"Baz Luhrmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367838/","name":"Ronald Harwood"}],"duration":"PT2H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
Ta luda ljubav
programme.desc: Crazy, Stupid, Love.: Directed by Glenn Ficarra, John Requa. With Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Julianne Moore, Emma Stone. A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1570728/","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MjkwMTM0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzc4NDg2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1570728/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"IronBallsM"},"dateCreated":"2011-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"I enjoyed everything about this movie.","reviewBody":"My initial reaction is that this film is the best romantic comedy that I've seen in years. The genre has been pretty devoid of quality lately. So, I don't know if that plays a part or not and I really don't care at this point. I enjoyed everything about this movie. It has tremendous heart and charisma and it's so very easy to get caught up in to the lives of these characters. A certain degree of patience is required while viewing because some secondary characters that feel unnecessary to the story are worth getting to know. Steve Carell's character is the one everyone empathizes with and when the movie shifts away from the "A" story you wonder why and start to think that the "B" story is going to be muddled or cliché or one to endure. Well, they're not and everything comes together in a wonderful fashion. The entire cast here is perfection. The overall message may be one to debate but it doesn't matter because the ride and this film are just so smart and so well done."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":493113,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-07-29","keywords":"divorce,marriage,unfaithfulness,adultery,marital problem","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crazy, Stupid, Love.","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722091801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MTY2NzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzYzNDg4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Newly single Cal Weaver (Steve Carell) is taken on as wingman and protÃ©gÃ© to handsome, thirtysomething player Jacob Palmer (Ryan Gosling). Despite a makeover and many new conquests, the one thing that canÂ’t be made over is his love for his wife (Julianne), who cheated on him and thinks she wants a divorce."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136797/","name":"Steve Carell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331516/","name":"Ryan Gosling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720135/","name":"John Requa"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0259041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stargirl

programme.desc: Stargirl: Created by Geoff Johns, Greg Berlanti. With Brec Bassinger, Anjelika Washington, Trae Romano, Amy Smart. Teenager Courtney Whitmore joins the Justice Society of America. programme.title: Ratatouille
Juhu-hu
programme.desc:
Ratatouille: Directed by Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava. With Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy. A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382932/","name":"Ratatouille","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ4MzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382932/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tedg"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hyper Reality","reviewBody":"Its easy to see how this story came about. Animators are puppeteers first. So if you asked an animator to come up with a story, naturally you will find two features: one would involve two on-screen characters, one the animator of the other. We have many jokes associated with how imperfectly the on-screen animator (our hero) works his puppet at first. Incidentally, this movie is preceded in the theater by a short: "Lifting." It features a novice "animator" of precisely this type, being graded. Notice the infinite panel of switches in that short.

Count on Pixar to find yet another way to fold introspection into the form. This is elaborated by the character of a critic. We see him first in a coffin-like office. He's only capable of destruction it seems. Voiced by Peter O'Toole in a stentorian voice-about-theater, he likes what he sees (tastes). Its a great trick you see. Usually this trick is in the form of an on screen audience watching some sort of climactic performance. When they cheer, we do too, as we become folded into the story.

In this case, that is handled by a place made for us and occupied by "the critic." So we have a place in the story for the animator and the viewer. What else? We'll need a place for the animation, right? And we have it.

It appears first as a book by a now dead, corpulent chef. This book, natch, comes alive. Look how "Ted's law" is followed: the distance between the "real" world of ourselves and the animated movie is the same as that from the animated movie and the "living cartoon" within. Its an explicit fold. And the fact that the inner cartoon has an open, personal feel to it conveys to the personal feel we are intended to have with the Pixar movie.

So these three folds: in the story is the story, the animator and the viewer. And the introductory short sets this up too.

Having said that, there are a couple noteworthy segments. In terms of the actual craft, Pixar has two areas in which it innovates.

One of these in how space is handled. The Pixar guys realized early on that if the three dimensions are going to be modeled anyway, you can zip the camera around in new ways. Early in the game they did this in an overt way. That's been picked up by the summer action films, the best of them, including the Depp pirate business. (Another Disney project benefiting from the eye motion lab.)

You can see this throughout the project: there are both all sorts of well managed, unusual perspectives, and a constant overlay of new shots. By this I mean that every shot is just a little different than what you've seen. Just a little canted. A little closer perhaps. A little movement that a physical camera cannot do well.

But there are some big production sequences as well. I'm particularly interested in architectural water. Its a unique cinematic challenge. Its not one done well in animation because the mathematics of simply making water look real is daunting. Pixar has done what needs to be done: they have made water hyper-real, dramatic. There's a sequence here that is something like that Pinnochio sequence of 67 years ago with the whale. But its so new and fresh and exciting. Look at the water and see that it has a million tiny agents all seeking to be angry  to do damage but never reaching consensus on just how to attack. This alone is worth the admission.

There's another thing that is uniquely Pixar: how characters move. Its a tricky thing, that. As with the water, it is not ever enough that they move realistically. You can make realistic movements by outfitting actors with sensors and translating that to the created beings. It captures nuance. And if you have a particularly skilled source actor, he or she will move not as a real person would, but as an actor would to convey reality. Real isn't real. We need hyperreal in special ways to get- read the reality.

The credits of this movie ostentatiously say that ""Our Quality Assurance Guarantee: 100% Genuine Animation! No motion capture or any other performance shortcuts were used in the production of this film." You can see it. We are entering a new era where both the cameras and the characters can use dramatic motions not possible with human eyes and bodies.

Its a challenge for viewers. What do we accept as embodiment? So far, the answer is that the non-natural movements must always be in the service of conveying or seeming natural. But I imagine at the speed this is developing, we may soon see something more.

One character note: Colette is voiced by the remarkable Janeane Garofalo. As with our hero, she has that French nose. As the love develops between these two, she becomes decidedly more sexy, both in voice and appearance. Its the appearance that I remark on here. Its all done with postures and a motorcycle. That motorcycle is there in part to allow her to bend forward, and change her lower anatomy. 

These folks at Pixar are good. Darn good. Glad its Steve Jobs as the creative inspiration instead of that evil other guy.

Ted's Evaluation -- 3 of 3: Worth watching."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":672861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-22","keywords":"rat,chef,ratatouille,cooking,paris france","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ratatouille","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi906147865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004951/","name":"Brad Garrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738918/","name":"Lou Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0135296/","name":"Jim Capobianco"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nesigurna
programme.desc: Humoristična serija, koju je osmislila i u kojoj glumi Issa Rae, govori o prijateljstvu dviju modernih crnkinja, kao i o svim njihovim neugodnim iskustvima i provokativnim nevoljama. Humoristična serija, koju je osmislila i u kojoj glumi Issa Rae, govori o prijateljstvu dviju modernih crnkinja, kao i o svim njihovim neugodnim iskustvima i provokativnim nevoljama. Dok se snalaze na nezgodnom profesionalnom i osobnom terenu Los Angelesa, najbolje prijateljice Issa (Rae) i Molly (Yvonne Orji) suočavaju se s izazovima crnkinja koje prkose svim stereotipima. Peta sezona prati naše omiljene likove dok procjenjuju svoje odnose, nove i stare, u nastojanju da shvate tko i što dolazi s njima u paketu u ovoj sljedećoj fazi njihova života.

programme.title: Bez oduševljenja, molim!
programme.desc: Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larryja Davida u ovoj hvaljenoj humorističnoj seriji u verité stilu koja ga prati kod kuće, na poslu i po gradu dok se suočava s raznim problemima s izmišljenim i stvarnim ličnostima. U sporednim ulogama glume Jeff Garlin i Cheryl Hines.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
Mamurluk 3
programme.desc:
The Hangover Part III: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Bradley Cooper, Ed Helms, Zach Galifianakis, Justin Bartha. When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1951261/","name":"The Hangover Part III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0NjE1MzMzODheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY4MTQ3Mzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1951261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"billgian"},"dateCreated":"2013-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Better than the second, not as good as the first.","reviewBody":"The Hangover Part III Review 

The truth is that Part III of this decent trilogy was pretty good, but not great, and definitely not awesome. I too was lured to the cinemas, due to the fact that there was a lot of controversy (and of course, a lot of advertising) to see if that film was good or not.

The cast was pretty good, with Zach Galifianakis returning -of course- and giving a great performance as the funny and weird character of Alan, who is actually why a lot of people went to the cinemas for.

The story advanced pretty well, with no actual "Hangover" this time, but with a bunch of nice story twisters and clever lines.

Unfortunately, the film didn't have the charm of the first film, the film that introduced us the great company of the "Wolf Pack" but I believe it was better than the second film, because the story progressed better, and the actors were more direct and lovable.

6.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":303031,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2013-05-29","keywords":"heart attack,giraffe,breast implant,prostitute,karaoke bar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Version 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2312742425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MjI4OTk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjMyNDczOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3MjI4OTk1N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjMyNDczOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This time, there's no wedding. programme.desc: I See You: Directed by Adam Randall. With Helen Hunt, Jon Tenney, Owen Teague, Judah Lewis. Strange occurrences plague a small town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a young boy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6079516/","name":"I See You","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzVkOWM5YTEtMDdkNi00YjMzLWEzNWEtODEwN2IyZTc4Yjg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjc5MTg0MzQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Strange occurrences plague a small town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a young boy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6079516/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very creative - albeit over the top, writing","reviewBody":"Novice director Adam Randall did an excellent job behind the camera and in directing his cast. All casting and performances were spot-on, with the exception of Helen Hunt, who seemed spaced-put and truly on all those pills she was popping. The score was perfection, creating the perfect tension and suspense. This film was actor Devon Graye's first screenplay, and he hit it out of the ballpark. Some of the twists were certainly over the top and there were some plot and technical issues, but for an amateur screenwriter, he did better than some recent seasoned writers' films I've seen lately. In comparison, his writing was genius. The 96 min runtime was perfect, but I felt the start was too slow and the ending too fast. I would've liked to have seen more even pacing. Nevertheless, I really enjoyed it and my head is still spinning from the plot twists. I'm definitely going to see it again. A well deserved 9/10 from me"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":43209,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-12-10","keywords":"phrogging,kidnapping,infidelity,murder,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2866921241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE2NmY5MmMtNTgxMC00OWFhLTk1NGMtNzk4M2EwZDQxNTg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE2NmY5MmMtNTgxMC00OWFhLTk1NGMtNzk4M2EwZDQxNTg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0855103/","name":"Jon Tenney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4977122/","name":"Owen Teague"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1726691/","name":"Adam Randall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121295/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493361/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0362154/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1984458/","name":"Devon Graye"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Justice League
Liga pravednika
programme.desc:
Justice League: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Gal Gadot. Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0974015/","name":"Justice League","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWVhZjZkYTItOGIwYS00NmRkLWJlYjctMWM0ZjFmMDU4ZjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0974015/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eddie_baggins"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Avenger's this is not","reviewBody":"You have to feel sorry for DC Comics.

Sure they've made more than a bucket load of cash with many of their releases, including of course this year's box office behemoth and critical darling Wonder Woman, but overall the company has been living in the shadows of Marvel for a number of years now and have been late to the party when it comes to superhero team-up events until now.

Suffering a troubled production that saw original director Zack Snyder depart the project late in the piece due to a family tragedy and replaced by Avenger's mastermind Joss Whedon, Justice League has had a far from smooth run to cinemas, that includes the fact we've never truly been properly introduced to its new main players, Aquaman, The Flash and Cyborg, with DC keen to get this ensemble together as quickly as possible.

Considering all of this, Justice League is not what I'd call a "bad" movie, in the sense that I'd warn everyone against seeing it, but this often jumbled and sometimes just not that interesting blockbuster is still far from the all-round winner DC would've been hoping for with Snyder and Whedon's film lacking both a genuinely good story arc (new villain Steppenwolf is just generic baddie 101 or even worse) and any true memorable set-pieces or set-ups.

At what feels like a fairly brisk 120 minute runtime, Justice League is always on the move as we initially get to witness the first meetings between this collection of new friends (the highlight of which is probably Ezra Miller's pizza eating Barry Allen/The Flash) but with so many people, so many different arcs to play out, Snyder and Whedon struggle to bring it all home and action scenes often feel haphazard, some scenes feel rushed or unwanted (a Russian family is given far too much screen time), while all the films colourful characters don't get the airtime they perhaps needed.

After the middling response so far to his take on Batman, Affleck won't be gaining or losing too many supporters here, the verdict is well and truly still out on Cavill's take on Superman, while Gadot is once again great as Wonder Woman. Of the new cast Miller is a fine addition as the awkward Allen, Jason Momoa gives fans hope that his standalone Aquaman will be a lot of fun, while it's surprising just how affecting Ray Fisher is as Cyborg even if his character doesn't seem cut out to get his own standalone feature.

It's a shame then that we don't ever feel like this team is given the scenarios they needed to really gel together. There's chemistry to be found here, even Cavill and Affleck benefit from the likes of Gadot and the new additions, their rather tiresome portrayals enlivened by the fresh, energetic nature of their co-stars but overall the film lacks an energy or pizazz that would've been the kicker to elevate this genuine middle of the road experience to something else entirely.

Final Say – 

All in all huge fans of DC will be kept happy with this sometimes enjoyable, sometimes downright bad big screen culmination of hero's and one badly CGI'd and generic villain.

Devoid of anything of true note and without a memorable set-piece, Justice League is unquestionably the poor cousin of The Avenger's but with the talented cast involved, there is enough hope here to suggest that this band of hero's have some room to grow into something special if all the stars align.

2 1/2 terrorised Russian families out of 5","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":426559,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2017-11-16","keywords":"justice league,superhero team,superhero,dc extended universe,comicbook movie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Justice League Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2454436121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmFhZmFlMGEtMjRjZS00MDUyLTllNWEtNzhhZGZjZTAwZjRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmFhZmFlMGEtMjRjZS00MDUyLTllNWEtNzhhZGZjZTAwZjRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"Extended Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2933757/","name":"Gal Gadot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597388/","name":"Jason Momoa"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0430860/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796950/","name":"Jerry Siegel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795975/","name":"Joe Shuster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0974015, Title: Justice League, --- Description: Justice League: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Gal Gadot. Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0974015/","name":"Justice League","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWVhZjZkYTItOGIwYS00NmRkLWJlYjctMWM0ZjFmMDU4ZjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0974015/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eddie_baggins","dateCreated":"2017-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Avenger's this is not","reviewBody":"You have to feel sorry for DC Comics.

Sure they've made more than a bucket load of cash with many of their releases, including of course this year's box office behemoth and critical darling Wonder Woman, but overall the company has been living in the shadows of Marvel for a number of years now and have been late to the party when it comes to superhero team-up events until now.

Suffering a troubled production that saw original director Zack Snyder depart the project late in the piece due to a family tragedy and replaced by Avenger's mastermind Joss Whedon, Justice League has had a far from smooth run to cinemas, that includes the fact we've never truly been properly introduced to its new main players, Aquaman, The Flash and Cyborg, with DC keen to get this ensemble together as quickly as possible.

Considering all of this, Justice League is not what I'd call a "bad" movie, in the sense that I'd warn everyone against seeing it, but this often jumbled and sometimes just not that interesting blockbuster is still far from the all-round winner DC would've been hoping for with Snyder and Whedon's film lacking both a genuinely good story arc (new villain Steppenwolf is just generic baddie 101 or even worse) and any true memorable set-pieces or set-ups.

At what feels like a fairly brisk 120 minute runtime, Justice League is always on the move as we initially get to witness the first meetings between this collection of new friends (the highlight of which is probably Ezra Miller's pizza eating Barry Allen/The Flash) but with so many people, so many different arcs to play out, Snyder and Whedon struggle to bring it all home and action scenes often feel haphazard, some scenes feel rushed or unwanted (a Russian family is given far too much screen time), while all the films colourful characters don't get the airtime they perhaps needed.

After the middling response so far to his take on Batman, Affleck won't be gaining or losing too many supporters here, the verdict is well and truly still out on Cavill's take on Superman, while Gadot is once again great as Wonder Woman. Of the new cast Miller is a fine addition as the awkward Allen, Jason Momoa gives fans hope that his standalone Aquaman will be a lot of fun, while it's surprising just how affecting Ray Fisher is as Cyborg even if his character doesn't seem cut out to get his own standalone feature.

It's a shame then that we don't ever feel like this team is given the scenarios they needed to really gel together. There's chemistry to be found here, even Cavill and Affleck benefit from the likes of Gadot and the new additions, their rather tiresome portrayals enlivened by the fresh, energetic nature of their co-stars but overall the film lacks an energy or pizazz that would've been the kicker to elevate this genuine middle of the road experience to something else entirely.

Final Say – 

All in all huge fans of DC will be kept happy with this sometimes enjoyable, sometimes downright bad big screen culmination of hero's and one badly CGI'd and generic villain.

Devoid of anything of true note and without a memorable set-piece, Justice League is unquestionably the poor cousin of The Avenger's but with the talented cast involved, there is enough hope here to suggest that this band of hero's have some room to grow into something special if all the stars align.

2 1/2 terrorised Russian families out of 5","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":426559,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2017-11-16","keywords":"justice league,superhero team,superhero,dc extended universe,comicbook movie","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Justice League Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2454436121","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmFhZmFlMGEtMjRjZS00MDUyLTllNWEtNzhhZGZjZTAwZjRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmFhZmFlMGEtMjRjZS00MDUyLTllNWEtNzhhZGZjZTAwZjRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"Extended Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2933757/","name":"Gal Gadot","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597388/","name":"Jason Momoa"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0430860/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796950/","name":"Jerry Siegel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795975/","name":"Joe Shuster","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ratatouille
Juhu-hu
programme.desc:
Ratatouille: Directed by Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava. With Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy. A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382932/","name":"Ratatouille","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ4MzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382932/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tedg"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hyper Reality","reviewBody":"Its easy to see how this story came about. Animators are puppeteers first. So if you asked an animator to come up with a story, naturally you will find two features: one would involve two on-screen characters, one the animator of the other. We have many jokes associated with how imperfectly the on-screen animator (our hero) works his puppet at first. Incidentally, this movie is preceded in the theater by a short: "Lifting." It features a novice "animator" of precisely this type, being graded. Notice the infinite panel of switches in that short.

Count on Pixar to find yet another way to fold introspection into the form. This is elaborated by the character of a critic. We see him first in a coffin-like office. He's only capable of destruction it seems. Voiced by Peter O'Toole in a stentorian voice-about-theater, he likes what he sees (tastes). Its a great trick you see. Usually this trick is in the form of an on screen audience watching some sort of climactic performance. When they cheer, we do too, as we become folded into the story.

In this case, that is handled by a place made for us and occupied by "the critic." So we have a place in the story for the animator and the viewer. What else? We'll need a place for the animation, right? And we have it.

It appears first as a book by a now dead, corpulent chef. This book, natch, comes alive. Look how "Ted's law" is followed: the distance between the "real" world of ourselves and the animated movie is the same as that from the animated movie and the "living cartoon" within. Its an explicit fold. And the fact that the inner cartoon has an open, personal feel to it conveys to the personal feel we are intended to have with the Pixar movie.

So these three folds: in the story is the story, the animator and the viewer. And the introductory short sets this up too.

Having said that, there are a couple noteworthy segments. In terms of the actual craft, Pixar has two areas in which it innovates.

One of these in how space is handled. The Pixar guys realized early on that if the three dimensions are going to be modeled anyway, you can zip the camera around in new ways. Early in the game they did this in an overt way. That's been picked up by the summer action films, the best of them, including the Depp pirate business. (Another Disney project benefiting from the eye motion lab.)

You can see this throughout the project: there are both all sorts of well managed, unusual perspectives, and a constant overlay of new shots. By this I mean that every shot is just a little different than what you've seen. Just a little canted. A little closer perhaps. A little movement that a physical camera cannot do well.

But there are some big production sequences as well. I'm particularly interested in architectural water. Its a unique cinematic challenge. Its not one done well in animation because the mathematics of simply making water look real is daunting. Pixar has done what needs to be done: they have made water hyper-real, dramatic. There's a sequence here that is something like that Pinnochio sequence of 67 years ago with the whale. But its so new and fresh and exciting. Look at the water and see that it has a million tiny agents all seeking to be angry  to do damage but never reaching consensus on just how to attack. This alone is worth the admission.

There's another thing that is uniquely Pixar: how characters move. Its a tricky thing, that. As with the water, it is not ever enough that they move realistically. You can make realistic movements by outfitting actors with sensors and translating that to the created beings. It captures nuance. And if you have a particularly skilled source actor, he or she will move not as a real person would, but as an actor would to convey reality. Real isn't real. We need hyperreal in special ways to get- read the reality.

The credits of this movie ostentatiously say that ""Our Quality Assurance Guarantee: 100% Genuine Animation! No motion capture or any other performance shortcuts were used in the production of this film." You can see it. We are entering a new era where both the cameras and the characters can use dramatic motions not possible with human eyes and bodies.

Its a challenge for viewers. What do we accept as embodiment? So far, the answer is that the non-natural movements must always be in the service of conveying or seeming natural. But I imagine at the speed this is developing, we may soon see something more.

One character note: Colette is voiced by the remarkable Janeane Garofalo. As with our hero, she has that French nose. As the love develops between these two, she becomes decidedly more sexy, both in voice and appearance. Its the appearance that I remark on here. Its all done with postures and a motorcycle. That motorcycle is there in part to allow her to bend forward, and change her lower anatomy. 

These folks at Pixar are good. Darn good. Glad its Steve Jobs as the creative inspiration instead of that evil other guy.

Ted's Evaluation -- 3 of 3: Worth watching."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":672861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-22","keywords":"rat,chef,ratatouille,cooking,paris france","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ratatouille","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi906147865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004951/","name":"Brad Garrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738918/","name":"Lou Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0135296/","name":"Jim Capobianco"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter i Kamen Mudraca
programme.desc:
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Richard Harris, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Saunders Triplets. An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0241527/","name":"Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ3NWNlNmQtMTE5ZS00MDdmLTlkZjUtZTBlM2UxMGFiMTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUwNzk3NDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0241527/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AvinashPatalay"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Alohomora - of the magical world...","reviewBody":"I watched this movie first time when I was left with no choice. My expectations were extremely low as I always wondered if Harry Potter books were over-hyped. How-ever after watching the movie it did make me a Harry Potter movie fan. And needless to say - this continues to remain my favourite of HP series. That brings to a point here.... the effect of expectations over a movie. True, expectations reduce joy.

Without going into the story I would certainly say Chris Columbus churns out a perfect pot-pourri of emotions, suspense and magic, delivering something appealing to all ages.

Every character brought to life on screen has done justice and leave an impression on you. Particularly notable performances by Emma Watson and Alan Rickman.

CGI are in plenty and made good of. The Quedditch game is picturised amazingly. The wizard's chess is treat to eyes.

Let's hope that the forthcoming HP series carries the similar magical touch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":704449,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2002-01-16","keywords":"magic,wizard,school of magic,based on novel,orphan","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3115057433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhlM2UyYTEtOThkZS00MTAyLWFlOGQtNzIwNTc5ZmVkOWQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhlM2UyYTEtOThkZS00MTAyLWFlOGQtNzIwNTc5ZmVkOWQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001321/","name":"Richard Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460141/","name":"Steve Kloves"}],"duration":"PT2H32M"}</script><metacontent="

An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0241527/","name":"Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ3NWNlNmQtMTE5ZS00MDdmLTlkZjUtZTBlM2UxMGFiMTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUwNzk3NDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0241527/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"AvinashPatalay","dateCreated":"2004-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Alohomora - of the magical world...","reviewBody":"I watched this movie first time when I was left with no choice. My expectations were extremely low as I always wondered if Harry Potter books were over-hyped. How-ever after watching the movie it did make me a Harry Potter movie fan. And needless to say - this continues to remain my favourite of HP series. That brings to a point here.... the effect of expectations over a movie. True, expectations reduce joy.

Without going into the story I would certainly say Chris Columbus churns out a perfect pot-pourri of emotions, suspense and magic, delivering something appealing to all ages.

Every character brought to life on screen has done justice and leave an impression on you. Particularly notable performances by Emma Watson and Alan Rickman.

CGI are in plenty and made good of. The Quedditch game is picturised amazingly. The wizard's chess is treat to eyes.

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?
