programme.desc: Saw: Directed by James Wan. With Leigh Whannell, Cary Elwes, Danny Glover, Ken Leung. Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0387564/","name":"Saw","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ2ZTBhNmEtZDBmYi00ODU0LTgzZmQtNmMxM2M4NzM1ZjE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0387564/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"asafko-96168"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A necessity for horror enthusiasts","reviewBody":"I do think this is a smart movie; it started the "strangers trapped together her and have to work together to get out" concept. Even though Leigh Whannel (spelling might be wrong) Doesn't act that well, you can see his fear, along with everyone else's. Not the most gruesome of the series. The twist at the end is one you didn't know to begin with but then you're like "omg totally makes sense now". This series is a fun one to watch, all the blood and gore. It is a classic among horror films. Definitely a necessity for horror enthusiasts to watch!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":399420,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-05-18","keywords":"surprise ending,locked in a room,trapped in a room,mind game,flashback","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"10th Anniversary Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi8957721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDc0NzE3NDBeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDk2NTEyODIx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MDc0NzE3NDBeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDk2NTEyODIx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the 10th Anniversary trailer for Saw."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000144/","name":"Cary Elwes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1191481/","name":"Leigh Whannell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000418/","name":"Danny Glover"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021715/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0115136/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1191481/","name":"Leigh Whannell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1490123/","name":"James Wan"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

The twist at the end is one you didn't know to begin with but then you're like "omg totally makes sense now". This series is a fun one to watch, all the blood and gore. Spides
programme.desc:
Spides: Created by Rainer Matsutani. With Rosabell Laurenti Sellers, Désirée Nosbusch, Falk Hentschel, Francis Fulton-Smith. Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8629136/","name":"Spides","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcyZjZiMjItMmZmNS00NTEwLTg4NmItOWQyZGNmMThmOTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMDk5OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8629136/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timstokes-55732"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Looking Forward to More...","reviewBody":"I've watched the first episode and in fairness there was a pleasantly surreal storyline, a few unpleasant surprises and a few good twists and turns, all good romping fun.

The acting was a fairly level playing field, no-one stood out but no-one was less than professional.

I enjoyed the visuals, actors and story enough to keep me engaged all the way through the episode.

I only watched this programme due to the extreme opposites in terms of reviews and what I feel is an unwarranted rating of 5. thoroughly enjoyed first ep. and cant wait for episode 2 :D","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":519,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"genre":["Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-03-05","keywords":"drug","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3065809/","name":"Rosabell Laurenti Sellers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0636440/","name":"Désirée Nosbusch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1571804/","name":"Falk Hentschel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0783904/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314952/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683188/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0559668/","name":"Rainer Matsutani"}]}</script><metacontent="

Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8629136/","name":"Spides","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcyZjZiMjItMmZmNS00NTEwLTg4NmItOWQyZGNmMThmOTk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjcyMDk5OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Murders, disappearances, and strange occurrences begin piling up in connection with the appearance of a new club drug called "Blis".","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8629136/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"timstokes-55732","dateCreated":"2020-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Looking Forward to More...","reviewBody":"I've watched the first episode and in fairness there was a pleasantly surreal storyline, a few unpleasant surprises and a few good twists and turns, all good romping fun.

programme.title: Eureka
Gradić Eureka
programme.desc: Eureka: Created by Andrew Cosby, Jaime Paglia. With Colin Ferguson, Salli Richardson-Whitfield, Erica Cerra, Neil Grayston. A U.S. Marshall becomes the sheriff of a remote cozy little Northwestern town of Eureka where the best minds in the US have secretly been tucked away to build futuristic inventions for the government which often go disastrously wrong." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0796264/","name":"Eureka","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMDQ0NDY1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU1Njk3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A U.S. Marshall becomes the sheriff of a remote cozy little Northwestern town of Eureka where the best minds in the US have secretly been tucked away to build futuristic inventions for the government which often go disastrously wrong","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0796264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stan411"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you like your Sci-fi..........","reviewBody":"Having seen the first three episodes, I can say that the Sci-Fi Channel has a great series on its hand. The shows are entertaining funny (in a tongue-in-cheek kind of way) and original. Colin Ferguson is great as the new Sheriff and other cast members seen elsewhere fit in nicely. The story lines have been original and NO-been there-seen that episodes come to mind. I'm not sure why IMDb has not posted the names of the stars as the series is no longer in production and is currently airing and even the Colin Ferguson page on IMDb does not list this show in his credits.(?) \n\nSo if you like your sci-fi with a little humor and some genuine caring about the characters, its hard to find a more worthy show than EUReKA!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50734,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-07-18","keywords":"scientist,problem solving,pacific northwest,small town,alternate reality","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724757/","name":"Salli Richardson-Whitfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1569714/","name":"Erica Cerra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184676/","name":"Andrew Cosby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1958727/","name":"Jaime Paglia"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eureka: The Complete Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3793855769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Eureka: The Complete Series"}}</script><metacontent="

The story lines have been original and NO-been there-seen that episodes come to mind. I'm not sure why IMDb has not posted the names of the stars as the series is no longer in production and is currently airing and even the Colin Ferguson page on IMDb does not list this show in his credits.(?) \n\nSo if you like your sci-fi with a little humor and some genuine caring about the characters, its hard to find a more worthy show than EUReKA!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50734,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-07-18","keywords":"scientist,problem solving,pacific northwest,small town,alternate reality","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724757/","name":"Salli Richardson-Whitfield","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1569714/","name":"Erica Cerra"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129175/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184676/","name":"Andrew Cosby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1958727/","name":"Jaime Paglia"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eureka: The Complete Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3793855769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Eureka: The Complete Series"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Warehouse 13
Skladište 13
programme.desc:
Warehouse 13: Created by Jane Espenson, D. Brent Mote. With Eddie McClintock, Joanne Kelly, Saul Rubinek, Allison Scagliotti. Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1132290/","name":"Warehouse 13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTFlY2I5Y2ItZTI1MC00MDM3LWI1MzEtMGU4ODFlOGUwNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132290/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"PlatoSays"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"What has happened to this once entertaining series?","reviewBody":"I've watched the entire run so far and after a good beginning, what has happened to it? By S4 mid-point, its turned into the most dreadful, ham-acted, soap opera where the artifact mysteries are largely overwhelmed by the childish acting - especially Pete who appears to have gone from being slightly immature macho man to an emotional 7yrs old. He reminds me a lot of Seeley Booth in Bones on a bad acting day.

Even Myky is suffering from the same affliction - she was the sensible one and now is hyper/silly girl which doesn't sit well. These two are meant to be top notch Secret Service agents in their late 20s for heaven's sake, not Buffy extras.

I can only assume the writing team has changed, or the producers are aiming at a younger/less demanding demographic. Whatever is going on - I certainly won't be tuning in to see the rest of S4 if it carries on like this.

What a pity.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-07","keywords":"occult detective,supernatural power,artifact,steampunk,shared universe","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565858/","name":"Eddie McClintock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1162399/","name":"Joanne Kelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007210/","name":"Saul Rubinek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0260870/","name":"Jane Espenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609315/","name":"D. programme.title: Eureka
Gradić Eureka
programme.desc: Eureka: Created by Andrew Cosby, Jaime Paglia. With Colin Ferguson, Salli Richardson-Whitfield, Erica Cerra, Neil Grayston. A U.S. Marshall becomes the sheriff of a remote cozy little Northwestern town of Eureka where the best minds in the US have secretly been tucked away to build futuristic inventions for the government which often go disastrously wrong." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0796264/","name":"Eureka","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMDQ0NDY1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU1Njk3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A U.S. Marshall becomes the sheriff of a remote cozy little Northwestern town of Eureka where the best minds in the US have secretly been tucked away to build futuristic inventions for the government which often go disastrously wrong","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0796264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stan411"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you like your Sci-fi..........","reviewBody":"Having seen the first three episodes, I can say that the Sci-Fi Channel has a great series on its hand. The shows are entertaining funny (in a tongue-in-cheek kind of way) and original. Colin Ferguson is great as the new Sheriff and other cast members seen elsewhere fit in nicely. The story lines have been original and NO-been there-seen that episodes come to mind. I'm not sure why IMDb has not posted the names of the stars as the series is no longer in production and is currently airing and even the Colin Ferguson page on IMDb does not list this show in his credits.(?) \n\nSo if you like your sci-fi with a little humor and some genuine caring about the characters, its hard to find a more worthy show than EUReKA!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50734,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-07-18","keywords":"scientist,problem solving,pacific northwest,small town,alternate reality","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724757/","name":"Salli Richardson-Whitfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1569714/","name":"Erica Cerra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184676/","name":"Andrew Cosby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1958727/","name":"Jaime Paglia"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eureka: The Complete Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3793855769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Eureka: The Complete Series"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Eureka: Created by Andrew Cosby, Jaime Paglia. With Colin Ferguson, Salli Richardson-Whitfield, Erica Cerra, Neil Grayston. A U.S. Marshall becomes the sheriff of a remote cozy little Northwestern town of Eureka where the best minds in the US have secretly been tucked away to build futuristic inventions for the government which often go disastrously wrong." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0796264/","name":"Eureka","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyMDQ0NDY1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU1Njk3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A U.S. Marshall becomes the sheriff of a remote cozy little Northwestern town of Eureka where the best minds in the US have secretly been tucked away to build futuristic inventions for the government which often go disastrously wrong","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0796264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stan411"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"If you like your Sci-fi..........","reviewBody":"Having seen the first three episodes, I can say that the Sci-Fi Channel has a great series on its hand. The shows are entertaining funny (in a tongue-in-cheek kind of way) and original. Colin Ferguson is great as the new Sheriff and other cast members seen elsewhere fit in nicely. The story lines have been original and NO-been there-seen that episodes come to mind. I'm not sure why IMDb has not posted the names of the stars as the series is no longer in production and is currently airing and even the Colin Ferguson page on IMDb does not list this show in his credits.(?) \n\nSo if you like your sci-fi with a little humor and some genuine caring about the characters, its hard to find a more worthy show than EUReKA!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50734,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-07-18","keywords":"scientist,problem solving,pacific northwest,small town,alternate reality","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272399/","name":"Colin Ferguson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724757/","name":"Salli Richardson-Whitfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1569714/","name":"Erica Cerra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184676/","name":"Andrew Cosby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1958727/","name":"Jaime Paglia"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eureka: The Complete Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3793855769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1OTgwN2UtMWNjMS00NjNiLTkyNzgtYmFjZGUyNjc5OTU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Eureka: The Complete Series"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nandi1023"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grimm","reviewBody":"This is a GREAT show!...Cleverly written and the actors are wonderful! Our Family LOVES this show! The way the writers mix the Grimm's Fairy tales into present day plots are very interesting. Seeing Portland,Oregon in all it's beauty and lushness is quite breathtaking. We especially liked the refrigerator repair man on "Danse Macabre". Of course Monroe is always fun. Kate Burton was a wonderful surprise on the pilot episode. David Giuntoli and Danny Bruno are AWESOME!!!!!!! The special effects are amazing. We like the autopsy scenes too even though pretty gruesome! It's way cool! I hope that NBC does the smart thing and keeps this one going... It's certainly a HIT in our house. Sincerely, Nancy Di Leo and Family.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113464,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"nandi1023","dateCreated":"2011-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grimm","reviewBody":"This is a GREAT show!...Cleverly written and the actors are wonderful! Our Family LOVES this show! The way the writers mix the Grimm's Fairy tales into present day plots are very interesting. Seeing Portland,Oregon in all it's beauty and lushness is quite breathtaking. We especially liked the refrigerator repair man on "Danse Macabre". Of course Monroe is always fun. Kate Burton was a wonderful surprise on the pilot episode. David Giuntoli and Danny Bruno are AWESOME!!!!!!! The special effects are amazing. We like the autopsy scenes too even though pretty gruesome! It's way cool! I hope that NBC does the smart thing and keeps this one going... It's certainly a HIT in our house. programme.title: Warehouse 13
Skladište 13
programme.desc:
Warehouse 13: Created by Jane Espenson, D. Brent Mote. With Eddie McClintock, Joanne Kelly, Saul Rubinek, Allison Scagliotti. Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1132290/","name":"Warehouse 13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTFlY2I5Y2ItZTI1MC00MDM3LWI1MzEtMGU4ODFlOGUwNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132290/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"PlatoSays"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"What has happened to this once entertaining series?","reviewBody":"I've watched the entire run so far and after a good beginning, what has happened to it? By S4 mid-point, its turned into the most dreadful, ham-acted, soap opera where the artifact mysteries are largely overwhelmed by the childish acting - especially Pete who appears to have gone from being slightly immature macho man to an emotional 7yrs old. He reminds me a lot of Seeley Booth in Bones on a bad acting day.

Even Myky is suffering from the same affliction - she was the sensible one and now is hyper/silly girl which doesn't sit well. These two are meant to be top notch Secret Service agents in their late 20s for heaven's sake, not Buffy extras.

I can only assume the writing team has changed, or the producers are aiming at a younger/less demanding demographic. Whatever is going on - I certainly won't be tuning in to see the rest of S4 if it carries on like this.

What a pity.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-07","keywords":"occult detective,supernatural power,artifact,steampunk,shared universe","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565858/","name":"Eddie McClintock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1162399/","name":"Joanne Kelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007210/","name":"Saul Rubinek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0260870/","name":"Jane Espenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609315/","name":"D. Brent Mote"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3550741017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1MjY5NDMxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA1MzIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1MjY5NDMxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA1MzIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A promotional trailer for the TV series "Warehouse 13," premiering in July on SyFy."}}</script><metacontent="

By S4 mid-point, its turned into the most dreadful, ham-acted, soap opera where the artifact mysteries are largely overwhelmed by the childish acting - especially Pete who appears to have gone from being slightly immature macho man to an emotional 7yrs old. He reminds me a lot of Seeley Booth in Bones on a bad acting day.

Even Myky is suffering from the same affliction - she was the sensible one and now is hyper/silly girl which doesn't sit well. These two are meant to be top notch Secret Service agents in their late 20s for heaven's sake, not Buffy extras.

I can only assume the writing team has changed, or the producers are aiming at a younger/less demanding demographic. Whatever is going on - I certainly won't be tuning in to see the rest of S4 if it carries on like this.

What a pity.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-07","keywords":"occult detective,supernatural power,artifact,steampunk,shared universe","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565858/","name":"Eddie McClintock","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1162399/","name":"Joanne Kelly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007210/","name":"Saul Rubinek"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0260870/","name":"Jane Espenson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609315/","name":"D. Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1132290/","name":"Warehouse 13","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTFlY2I5Y2ItZTI1MC00MDM3LWI1MzEtMGU4ODFlOGUwNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132290/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"PlatoSays"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"What has happened to this once entertaining series?","reviewBody":"I've watched the entire run so far and after a good beginning, what has happened to it? By S4 mid-point, its turned into the most dreadful, ham-acted, soap opera where the artifact mysteries are largely overwhelmed by the childish acting - especially Pete who appears to have gone from being slightly immature macho man to an emotional 7yrs old. He reminds me a lot of Seeley Booth in Bones on a bad acting day.

Even Myky is suffering from the same affliction - she was the sensible one and now is hyper/silly girl which doesn't sit well. These two are meant to be top notch Secret Service agents in their late 20s for heaven's sake, not Buffy extras.

I can only assume the writing team has changed, or the producers are aiming at a younger/less demanding demographic. Whatever is going on - I certainly won't be tuning in to see the rest of S4 if it carries on like this.

What a pity.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-07","keywords":"occult detective,supernatural power,artifact,steampunk,shared universe","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565858/","name":"Eddie McClintock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1162399/","name":"Joanne Kelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007210/","name":"Saul Rubinek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0260870/","name":"Jane Espenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609315/","name":"D. Time-travelling rogue Rip Hunter has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4532368/","name":"Legends of Tomorrow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDUxM2YwODYtYTNlMy00NzZjLWE0MzktYWNhY2MxNWJlMmRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Time-travelling rogue Rip Hunter has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4532368/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Monicacorpuz"},"dateCreated":"2017-03-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun and light-hearted","reviewBody":"People! Give it a break! This show never fails to make me laugh! It's ridiculous, cheesy and a ton of fun. Suspend reality and enjoy the ride- this is not meant for heavy thinking, deep romances or for pondering your role in life. It's fun. The humor is the truly captivating part. You never know where or when it's going to come from, but this show is a hoot- as long as you don't take yourself too seriously. I suggest giving it a try- I think this show has earned it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98436,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-01-21","keywords":"dc comics,2010s,based on comic book,time travel,dc arrowverse","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2362068/","name":"Caity Lotz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1683343/","name":"Amy Louise Pemberton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700712/","name":"Dominic Purcell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0330789/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0265986/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075528/","name":"Greg Berlanti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0973233/","name":"Marc Guggenheim"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0459237/","name":"Phil Klemmer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 6 Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi679133209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGExMDE0ZjQtNmFlMy00NmM4LWFmNTYtZWUyYjgzODhlYWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGExMDE0ZjQtNmFlMy00NmM4LWFmNTYtZWUyYjgzODhlYWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Airing Sundays at 8/7c on The CW, DC's Legends of\nTomorrow is based on the characters from DC and has been renewed for a seventh season."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Saw II
Slagalica strave 2
programme.desc:
Saw II: Directed by Darren Lynn Bousman. With Tobin Bell, Shawnee Smith, Donnie Wahlberg, Erik Knudsen. A detective and his team must rescue 8 people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0432348/","name":"Saw II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4Mjg4YTgtZWU2MC00MzVlLTg3MDgtYzUyYzU1NGMyMmU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective and his team must rescue 8 people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0432348/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stupidmunk"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too Gory for Popcorn","reviewBody":"This movie has just mad a quantum leap in horror films. after watching this movie i had the chills walking to my car, and lets say that i more than enjoy a scary movie. this movie kept me up for at least and hour after watching it. it was one of those movies were you cant let it out of your mind. 

The movie had one of the best openings that i have seen in a long time. after a few minutes into the movie i had to put down my popcorn. i don't have a weak stomach and this movie got me to put down my popcorn, that is huge. 

With a great blend of suspense, acting, and oh yes there was a lot of blood. this movie great deserves another watch, i would pay to see this movie a couple of times. not to mention one of the best twists i have seen in a movie. i would say 2nd best ending i have seen in a movie.(#1 was Fight Club). you definitely have to see this movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":243264,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2006-02-15","keywords":"serial killer,vcr,trap,torture,police officer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3544187417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk1ZTNhNjItZDcwNC00Mzk2LWI3MGMtZTgxYjI2ODZlMThkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk1ZTNhNjItZDcwNC00Mzk2LWI3MGMtZTgxYjI2ODZlMThkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Lionsgate Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005238/","name":"Beverley Mitchell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065281/","name":"Franky G"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1135423/","name":"Darren Lynn Bousman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021715/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085055/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1191481/","name":"Leigh Whannell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1135423/","name":"Darren Lynn Bousman"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="
